message.content:
cs.NE, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SY

The paper discusses a heuristic for controlling the mutation probability and population size of a genetic algorithm, which is a common optimization technique used in various fields including machine learning and computational biology. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also mentions statistical mechanics and critical states, which suggests a possible connection to cs.CC (Computational Complexity) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). Additionally, the paper discusses the behavior of the genetic algorithm, which could fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
